mapper.select: SELECT vfboard_id, vfboard_title, vfboard_like, user_id, vfboard_cnt, vfboard_date FROM volunteerFeedbackBoard ORDER BY vfboard_id DESC

select distinct v.vfboard_id, v.vfboard_title, v.vfboard_content, v.vfboard_like, v.vfboard_cnt, v.vfboard_date, v.user_id, r.user_id as reUserId, r.report_detail, r.report_id, r.report_sort from volunteerFeedbackBoard v left join report r on v.vfboard_id = r.vfboard_id where v.vfboard_id = #{vfboardId} and (r.user_id = #{userId} or r.user_id is null)
mapper.insert:
SELECT volunteerFeedbackBoard_seq.nextval from DUAL
insert into volunteerFeedbackBoard (vfboard_id, vfboard_title, vfboard_content, user_id) VALUES (#{vfboardId}, #{vfboardTitle}, #{vfboardContent}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE volunteerFeedbackBoard SET vfboard_cnt = vfboard_cnt +1 WHERE vfboard_id = #{vfboardId}
